de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd

Class CommonCreateAndPublishSubCommand<O extends CreateAndPublishOptions>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd.BaseSubCommand<O>
      • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd.CommonCreateAndPublishSubCommand<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - type of options
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubCommand<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateSubCommand, PublishSubCommand

    public abstract class CommonCreateAndPublishSubCommand<O extends CreateAndPublishOptions>
extends BaseSubCommand<O>
    Common functionality for CreateSubCommand and PublishSubCommand.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
